catalog.name: GCIP FSL MAPS MORDS and MOLTS data, hourly.

dataset.name: GCIP FSL MAPS MORDS and MOLTS data, hourly.

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - GCIP FSL MAPS MORDS and MOLTS data, hourly.(d609001)

metadata.documentation: The NOAA FSL MAPS model data (including Model Output Reduced Data Set (MORDS) and Model Location Time Series (MOLTS) data) for the GCIP project. The MAPS model used for GCIP is an advanced, experimental version which is running on a 40 km grid with 40 vertical isentropic-sigma levels. Data are ingested into MAPS on a 1-hour assimilation cycle. Forecasts are run from MAPS out to 12-hour every 3 hours.
